\newcommand{\diagrampath}{./diagrams/}
\newcommand{\plotpath}{./plots}

\newcommand{\mathbi}[1]{\mathit{\mathbf{#1}}}

\newcommand\vstate[3]{%
	\mathbf{\underline{#1}}%
	\ifstrempty{#2}{}{[#2]}%
	\ifstrempty{#3}{}{\langle #3 \rangle}}

\newcommand\tvstate[3]{%
	\mathbf{\underline{#1}\vphantom{\hat{\underline{#1}}}}%
	\ifstrempty{#2}{}{[#2]}%
	\ifstrempty{#3}{}{\langle #3 \rangle}}

\newcommand\sstate[3]{%
	\mathit{\underline{#1}}%
	\ifstrempty{#2}{}{[#2]}%
	\ifstrempty{#3}{}{\langle #3 \rangle}%
	}
